summary: A look at the creation and impact of the 1972 Rolling Stones album "Exile on Main St."
cast: The Rolling Stones|Mick Jagger|Keith Richards|Charlie Watts|Bill Wyman|Mick Taylor|Marshall Chess|Sheryl Crow|Benicio Del Toro|Caleb Followill|Ashli Haynes|Andy Johns|Anita Pallenberg|Liz Phair|Martin Scorsese|Dominique Tarle|Don Was|Jake Weber|Jack White|Will.i.am
title: Stones in Exile
